title: Spectral inequalities for Schrödinger operators with surface potentials
abstract: We prove sharp Lieb-Thirring inequalities for Schrödinger operators with potentials supported on a hyperplane and we show how these estimates are related to Lieb-Thirring inequalities for relativistic Schrödinger operators.
